channel.title: blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Social novelty filtering (or Google Reader, R.I.P.)
item.description: <html><head></head><body>Wherein I muse about Google Reader past, and what it might have been. And, wherein I describe what I hope springs up in the aftermath of its closing.</body></html>
